resources.string: LocalGuide provides an easy way to search for anything around you.Gives you detailed result of address,phone numbers.The search categories can be (eg. pubs brimingham,theatres liverpool, hospital edinburgh)
\n\tIf the city or country is not entered, your current location will be automitcally picked up either through GPS or with your Wifi info.Once the desired result is chosen ,it gives you an option to
Please authenticate your twitter and facebook accounts

Location is obtained using two ways GPS and Wifi or CELL-ID. Although GPS works only in outdoors it is accurate.But it is time consuming and eats up battery power.Network Location Provider uses cell tower and Wifi signals to identify location and it is faster than GPS.

	So it is recommended to turn ON both the location providers under Settings->Location Security->My Location.
Couldn\'t find the routes to this destination
Sorry, Couldn\'t fetch the current location, due to unavailability of network or GPS provider.If using only GPS provider please consider finding the location in an open space.
Sorry, Couldn\'t fetch the current location, due to reverse geocoding error
Please go to help page and authenticate with your twitter account
Please go to help page and authenticate with your facebook account
